scripts.build:baidu-so:linux: CARGO_TARGET_DIR=build/baidu_verify-build/linux cargo build --release --manifest-path src-tauri/baidu_verify/Cargo.toml && mkdir -p build/baidu_verify/linux dist/baidu_verify/linux && cp build/baidu_verify-build/linux/release/libbaidu_verify.so build/baidu_verify/linux/libbaidu_verify.so && cp build/baidu_verify-build/linux/release/libbaidu_verify.so dist/baidu_verify/linux/libbaidu_verify.so
scripts.build:baidu-so:windows: powershell -Command "$env:CARGO_TARGET_DIR='build/baidu_verify-build\windows'; cargo build --release --manifest-path src-tauri/baidu_verify/Cargo.toml; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path 'build/baidu_verify\windows','dist/baidu_verify\windows' | Out-Null; Copy-Item 'build/baidu_verify-build\windows\release\baidu_verify.dll' -Destination 'build/baidu_verify\windows\baidu_verify.dll' -Force; Copy-Item 'build/baidu_verify-build\windows\release\baidu_verify.dll' -Destination 'dist/baidu_verify\windows\baidu_verify.dll' -Force"
scripts.package:windows:x64: tauri build --bundles nsis --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc && powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "& { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path 'dist\windows' | Out-Null; $nsis = Get-ChildItem 'build\tauri-target\x86_64-pc-windows-msvc\release\bundle\nsis\*.exe' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -First 1; if ($nsis) { Copy-Item $nsis.FullName -Destination 'dist\windows\HanamiRIP-CN_x64-setup.exe' -Force } else { Write-Error 'NSIS installer not found (x64)'; exit 1 } }"
scripts.package:windows:x86: tauri build --bundles nsis --target i686-pc-windows-msvc && powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "& { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path 'dist\windows' | Out-Null; $nsis = Get-ChildItem 'build\tauri-target\i686-pc-windows-msvc\release\bundle\nsis\*.exe' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -First 1; if ($nsis) { Copy-Item $nsis.FullName -Destination 'dist\windows\HanamiRIP-CN_x86-setup.exe' -Force } else { Write-Error 'NSIS installer not found (x86)'; exit 1 } }"
